channel.title: Help on changing item bonuses and adding commands
channel.description: i forget were to change the item bonuses. Also how do you add new commands to your server like ::ownerlook ::modlook, ::adminlook, ::pure and stuff like that. any help will be greatly appricated

item.title: Help on changing item bonuses and adding commands
item.dc:creator: @Goth_Wolf Goth Wolf
item.description:
@Goth_Wolf wrote:

Ok for item bonuses go into your config file and open item.cfg with wordpad then here and example

Original Code:

item = 35 Armadyl_godsword This_used_to_belong_to_King_Arthur. 50000000 50000000 50000000 0 132 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 132 8
the first 3 numbers are the amount it worth i forget which is which but its for low alch high alch and shop price then the rest of the numbers are bonuses last 2 are str and prayer bonus

for add skills like ::pure

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && (playerRights >= 1)) { addSkillXP(Exp Given, SkillId); addSkillXP(Exp Given, SkillId); addSkillXP(Exp Given, SkillId); addSkillXP(Exp Given, SkillId); addSkillXP(Exp Given, SkillId); addSkillXP(Exp Given, SkillId); }

This does all stats cept defence just an example code first number is xp it gives and second is the stat id (i forgot which stat is which)

And for giving items would be something like this

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Command")) { addItem(ItemId, Amount Given); addItem(ItemId, Amount Given); addItem(ItemId, Amount Given); }

All you do to add these commands are search and already existing command and add under it
Sorry if i donâ€™t make to much sense lol

Read full topic
item.source: Help on changing item bonuses and adding commands
